summary: Max finds himself in possession of an ancient scroll that describes the entire history of humankind from beginning to end. Seeking to use the information for his own gain, Max triggers the mechanism that begins influencing his own life.
cast: Israel Sasha Demidov|Irina Barinova|Henry David|Roi Miron|Oleg Fendura|Svetlana Demidov|Sergey Popov|Igal Reznik|Yuri Yadikin|Vladimir Zolin|Igor Gomenuk|Giora Shtark|Benzi Giertz|Ariel Ershkovitz|Eduard Nuzbroh|Dmitry Bon|Janna Ignatkova|Igor Razdorozhnyy|Vladek Zankovsky|Katya Zhylka
title: El Secreto del Zohar
